effect_entries.effect: Allows the trainer to ride the Magnet Train between []{location:goldenrod-city} and []{location:saffron-city}.
effect_entries.short_effect: Grants access to ride the Magnet Train between Goldenrod City and Saffron City.

flavor_text_entries.text:
リニアカーに　乗るときに　必要な
チケット。　いつでも　乗り放題。

A pass required for riding the Magnet
Train. It allows you to ride whenever
and however much you’d like.

Biglietto necessario per viaggiare sul supertreno.
Utilizzabile a volontà.

Poké Ball que se utiliza en el Concurso de
Captura de Bichos.

Eine Fahrkarte, die einem die Reise mit dem
Magnetzug ermöglicht. Gilt für beliebig viele
Fahrten.

Un ticket nécessaire pour monter à bord du
Train Magnétique. Utilisable à volonté.

리니어 카를 탈 때 필요한
티켓. 언제든지 무제한으로 이용 가능.

リニアカーに　のるときに　ひつような
チケット。　いつでも　のりほうだい。

A ticket required for riding the Magnet
Train. It allows you to ride whenever
and however much you’d like.

A ticket required for riding the Magnet
Train. It allows you to ride whenever
and however much you’d like.

Un ticket nécessaire pour monter
à bord du Train Magnétique.
Utilisable à volonté.

Train. It allows you to ride whenever
and however much you’d like.
